subject: Congratulations, You're Lucky! [Mon, 09 Apr 2007 01:29:48 -0800]
body: Here I am, he thought once, the world's only monastic druggie.     aim chronicle    He listened and heard nothing at all from upstairs.But if you turned the thing over to take a look at the works, you saw a blood-slimed killing machine with a very sharp blade.   The following night the clouds unravelled and blew away. They're having what they call The World's Biggest Flea Market this week.     Yes, he supposed he did.  but I think I know.     As she came in, he was surprised to find himself able to say it, and say it with a certain amount of dignity: "Go ahead and kill me, Annie, if that's what you mean to do, but at least have the decency to make it quick.       He had been aware of dryness in his mouth and throat for a long time, but now it began to seem more urgent.  alvin
